name: Rocket Trump
description: A comedic action platformer in which the player is immersed in a world where nuclear disaster is imminent. The character is equipped with a rocket launcher that suddenly falls out of the sky.  The rocket launcher becomes the player’s best friend and sidekick throughout the game. Together, the player will learn to harness the power of the launcher for movement and defense. The game is heavily focused on momentum and direction. Understanding the two concepts will assist the player in making the journey from the rural countryside of Kentucky to the booming metropolis of New York City, where the country’s nuclear arsenal resides. With the apocalypse coming close, the only option is to detonate the stockpile, rocketing you to the moon. The player must own their American pride and integrity while they blow themselves to the moon.
